org.asoem.greyfish.impl.environment

Interface BasicEnvironment

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DiscreteEventScheduler, DiscreteTime, DiscreteTimeEnvironment<BasicAgent>, Environment<BasicAgent>, Scheduler, SynchronizedAgentsEnvironment<BasicAgent>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultBasicEnvironment

    public interface BasicEnvironment
extends SynchronizedAgentsEnvironment<BasicAgent>
    The getSimulation environment for agents of type BasicAgent.
